image:image.image:title: Retro pixel art diagram showing Console Quest architecture: multiple computers connecting via SSH to a central Docker container displaying 'SSH ACCESS GRANTED', which connects to Claude Code API in the cloud
Dark datacenter with glowing green and red server LEDs, cables and hardware creating a cyberpunk atmosphere

A cluttered office workspace filled with large piles of papers, books, CDs, and miscellaneous items on the desk and floor, with a computer monitor, keyboard, and an empty office chair in front of a whiteboard covered in handwritten notes.
Rack-mounted homelab NAS with test bench motherboard holder and hard drives mounted beneath shelf using ventilation holes
Rack shelf ventilation holes with nylon washers used for hard drive mounting
Network rack showing UniFi Switch, Raspberry Pi, NAS in test bench, and somewhat organized cables
